pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit Generalized Odds Rate Mixture Cure Model with Interval Censored Data // Generalized Odds Rate Mixture Cure (GORMC) model is a flexible model of fitting survival data with a cure fraction, including the Proportional Hazards Mixture Cure (PHMC) model and the Proportional Odds Mixture Cure Model as special cases. This package fit the GORMC model with interval censored data.
